casebody.data:
Richard ALTMAN, Respondent,
v.
285 WEST FOURTH LLC, Appellant. 2018-220 Court of Appeals of New York. February 15, 2018

Motion by Make the Road New York et al. for leave to appear amici curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
